Wichita.KEC59: KEC59 (sometimes referred to as Wichita All Hazards) is a NOAA Weather Radio station that serves the Wichita metropolitan area and surrounding cities. It is programmed from the National Weather Service forecast office in Wichita, Kansas with its transmitter located in the same city. It broadcasts weather and hazard information for the following Counties: Butler, Cowley, Harper, Harvey, Kingman, Reno, Sedgwick, and Sumner.
